skill.name: email-agent
skill.description: Processes incoming emails for Unite-Hub. Extracts sender data, identifies communication intents, links to CRM contacts, analyzes sentiment, and updates contact records with AI insights.
skill.summary: Processes incoming emails for Unite-Hub. Extracts sender data, identifies communication intents, lin...
skill.author: CleanExpo

security_audit.summary: Pure documentation/prompt file containing AI instructions for email processing. No executable code, no scripts, no file system access, and no network calls defined. Behavior matches stated purpose exactly.

content.value_statement: Manually processing incoming emails wastes hours of valuable time. The Email Agent automatically extracts sender data, identifies communication intents, analyzes sentiment, and updates your CRM contacts with AI insights.
actual_capabilities: Fetch and process unprocessed emails from workspace
Extract sender information and link to existing CRM contacts
Identify communication intents (inquiry, proposal, complaint, question, followup, meeting)
Update contact records with AI-generated scores and interaction notes
Create complete audit logs for all processing actions
limitations: Requires Convex backend integration for email fetching and contact management
Cannot access email accounts directly; processes emails already stored in database
Limited to predefined intent keywords; may miss nuanced communication
Sentiment analysis is keyword-based; contextual sarcasm may not be detected

use_cases.title: Qualify inbound leads
use_cases.description: Automatically identify and score leads from incoming emails based on intent and sentiment analysis.

use_cases.title: Route support requests
use_cases.description: Detect complaint emails and automatically flag high-priority support issues for immediate response.

use_cases.title: Track partnership inquiries
use_cases.description: Monitor and categorize partnership and collaboration requests to build relationship timelines.

prompt_templates.title: Basic email processing
prompt_templates.prompt: Process emails for my workspace. Fetch all unprocessed emails, analyze each one for sender, intents, and sentiment, then link contacts and update records.

prompt_templates.title: Filter by sentiment
prompt_templates.prompt: Process emails and identify all positive sentiment emails with inquiry or partnership intent. List the contacts I should prioritize.

prompt_templates.title: Create followup list
prompt_templates.prompt: Process today's emails and generate a followup list with meeting requests and high-value inquiries. Include contact details and recommended actions.

prompt_templates.title: Weekly email digest
prompt_templates.prompt: Process all emails from the past week. Provide a summary of total processed, sentiment breakdown, top intents detected, and new contacts created.

output: Intents extracted: inquiry (5), proposal (3), question (2), meeting (2)

best_practices: Process emails regularly to keep CRM contact scores current and accurate
Review sentiment-analyzed emails daily to catch negative customer feedback early
Use the audit logs to track agent performance and identify processing errors
anti_patterns: Processing emails without checking for high-priority negative sentiment first
Ignoring new contact creation; always verify linked contacts are correct
Skipping audit logs; they are essential for compliance and troubleshooting

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: Works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Optimized for Claude Opus and Sonnet for best intent analysis accuracy.

faq.question: How many emails can it process at once?
faq.answer: Default limit is 50 emails per batch. Increase limit for large inboxes or decrease for faster processing with large attachments.

faq.question: Does it integrate with Gmail or Outlook?
faq.answer: No direct integration. The skill processes emails already stored in a Convex database. Use a sync tool to import emails first.

faq.question: Is my email data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. All processing happens within your workspace. No email data is sent to external services beyond your configured backend.

faq.question: What if sentiment analysis is wrong?
faq.answer: Review flagged contacts after processing. The AI score is a suggestion; manually adjust contact scores and notes as needed.

faq.question: How does this differ from email filters?
faq.answer: Unlike basic filters, this agent understands context, extracts intent, analyzes tone, and updates CRM records automatically.
